Entry.JapaneseText: ねえ、<Annie>のお父さんのドクター・バースって 王様のお医者さんだった人だよネ？
Entry.EnglishText: Hey, wasn't <Annie>'s father, Doctor Barrs, the royal physician?

Entry.JapaneseText: ああ、ラドラス陛下に認められた優洲な医師だった。 陛下の惹治医でもあったんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: He was. King Ladras himself had recognized his medical prowess. He also served as His Majesty's physician.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……不幸にも、それがバースにとって…… あの事件の……いや……
Entry.EnglishText: Unfortunately... That incident occurred... because Barrs... well...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……ゴメン……つらいコト 思い出させちゃったかな……？
Entry.EnglishText: Sorry... Did I bring up something painful for you?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……そんなに気を遣わなくてもいい。 大丈夫だ。
Entry.EnglishText: You don't need to worry about me. I'll be fine.
